Title: Free modern workplace
Blurb: Discover the power of Microsoft 365’s modern workplace—free for 14 days. Collaborate in Teams, manage content in SharePoint, and automate tasks with Power Automate. Build custom apps, streamline workflows, and work securely from anywhere. It’s everything your team needs to work smarter, faster, and together.

Title: An app in a week
Blurb: Get a custom business app built in just one week — fast, focused, and ready to test.

Blurb: Ensure your environment meets compliance standards with a free health check
